context: Architectural decision documentation - tests whether the agent uses proper ADR format and architectural decision-making process

checklist.name: Classifies as architectural decision
checklist.description: Correctly identifies this as architectural (not tactical/foundational)

checklist.name: Uses proper ADR format
checklist.description: Includes Status, Context, Decision, Alternatives, Consequences sections

checklist.name: Documents alternatives with rationale
checklist.description: Lists all 3 options with pros/cons analysis

checklist.name: Explains chosen decision clearly
checklist.description: States the selected approach and why it was chosen

checklist.name: Documents risks and mitigation
checklist.description: Identifies potential problems and how to address them

checklist.name: Includes validation steps
checklist.description: Specifies how to verify the decision works (peer review, etc.)

checklist.name: Applies architectural dependency checks
checklist.description: Considers dependency direction and coupling implications
